title: Suuri Kalliojärvi
description:
A serene lake surrounded by rugged rock formations 

      and pine forest, Suuri Kalliojärvi offers peaceful short hiking route 

      around it in the heart of North Karelia’s wild nature..

title: Karhutunturi
description:
A peaceful fell rising from the taiga near the Russian border, \n 
      Karhutunturi provides quiet hiking routes through rolling hills, boreal \n
      forest, and wide vistas typical of eastern Lapland.

title: Ruunaanjärvi
description:
A tranquil lake at the heart of the Ruunaa area, Ruunaanjärvi \n 
      is ideal for canoeing and fishing, with easy access to wilderness trails and \n
      scenic camping spots along its shores

title: Ruunaa
description:
A popular outdoor destination featuring white-water rapids, \n
      forest trails, and accessible wilderness, Ruunaa offers exciting canoeing \n
      adventures and hiking in untouched river landscapes.

title: Ruunaa
description:
A popular outdoor destination featuring white-water rapids, \n
      forest trails, and accessible wilderness, Ruunaa offers exciting canoeing \n
      adventures and hiking in untouched river landscapes.

title: Patvinsuo
description:
Known for its vast mires, old-growth forests, and clear \n
        lakes, Patvinsuo is a haven for birdwatchers, hikers, and canoeists looking \n 
        to experience Finland’s diverse wetland ecosystems.
